solution_line_template: If ${recent_painting_sale} is ${less_amount} less than five times more than he had made on his previous painting, then ${recent_painting_sale}+${less_amount} = ${five_times_previous_painting} is five times what he made on his previous painting.

If ${five_times_previous_painting} is five times what he made for his previous painting, then he made ${five_times_previous_painting}/{multiplier} = $<<{five_times_previous_painting}/{multiplier}={previous_painting_earnings}>>{previous_painting_earnings} for selling his previous painting.
